name: Medical Materials
description: A Telegram bot with auto-filter capabilities for medical materials.

WEBHOOK.description: Set to True if server requires web support, otherwise False.

CHANNELS.description: Channel or group IDs. Separate multiple IDs by space.

ADMINS.description: Admin IDs or usernames. Separate multiple admins by space.

PICS.description: Links to telegraph images for bot appearance.

LOG_CHANNEL.description: Channel ID for bot logs, e.g., -100xxxxxxxx.

AUTH_CHANNEL.description: Channel ID for user authorization; bot must be an admin in this channel.

MAX_RIST_BTNS.description: Max number of search result buttons (10 or below).

CUSTOM_FILE_CAPTION.description: Custom file caption format with placeholders like {file_name} and {file_size}.

COLLECTION_NAME.description: Name of the MongoDB collection for storing files.

START_MESSAGE.description: Start message with placeholders {user} for user name and {bot} for bot name.
